name: main

definition.annotation: This workflow performs quality and contamination control analysis on assembled contigs to assess bacterial genome quality and taxonomic assignment
definition.name: Post-Assembly Quality Control and Contamination Check for Bacterial Genomes

readme:
# Bacterial quality and Contamination control post assembly workflow

This workflow uses paired-end illumina fastq(.gz) files and executes the following steps:

1. Genome assembly quality control
   - **Quast** to assess genome quality
   - **Checkm2** to predict the completeness and contamination in an assembly
2. Taxonomic assignment on contigs
   - **Kraken2** assignment
   - **Bracken** to re-estimate abundance to the species level
3. Aggregating outputs into a single JSON file
   - **ToolDistillator** to extract and aggregate information from different tool outputs to JSON parsable files

## Inputs

1. Fasta as contigs from raw reads assembly.

   Optional : Paired-end illumina raw reads in fastq(.gz) format. (Used with Quast)

## Outputs

1. Genome assembly quality:
   - quality reports
2. Taxonomic assignation:
   - Tabular report of identified species
   - Tabular file with assigned read to a taxonomic level
   - Krona chart to illustrate species diversity of the sample
3. Aggregating outputs:
   - JSON file with information about the outputs of **Quast, Checkm2**, **Kraken2**, **Bracken**
changelog:
# Changelog

## [1.0.2] - 2025-12-01

### Automatic update

- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/tooldistillator/tooldistillator/1.0.0+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/tooldistillator/tooldistillator/1.0.4+galaxy0`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/tooldistillator_summarize/tooldistillator_summarize/1.0.0+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/tooldistillator_summarize/tooldistillator_summarize/1.0.4+galaxy0`

### Removed

* Remove some Tooldistillator input because the main information is not found in these files
* Remove Recentrifuge

### Changed

* Changed Bracken's mismatch parameter from 10 to 1 because it caused problems for fasta files containing fewer than 10 contigs

## [1.0.1] - 2025-08-25

### Automatic update

- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/kraken2/kraken2/2.1.3+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/kraken2/kraken2/2.1.3+galaxy2`

## [1.0] - 2025-08-08

- First release
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1150 560" role="img" aria-label="Post-Assembly Quality Control workflow diagram">
  <title>Post-Assembly Quality and Contamination Control</title>
  <desc>Quality and contamination control analysis on assembled contigs to assess bacterial genome quality, completeness, and taxonomic assignment</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>

    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1150" height="560" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1150" height="560" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <!-- Title bar -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1150" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Post-Assembly Quality and Contamination Control</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->

  <!-- Contigs FASTA to QUAST -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 135 C 280 135, 310 110, 390 110"/>
  <!-- Contigs FASTA to CheckM2 -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 135 C 280 135, 310 220, 390 220"/>
  <!-- Contigs FASTA to Kraken2 -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 135 C 290 135, 310 330, 390 330"/>

  <!-- Forward reads to QUAST (optional) -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 255 C 260 255, 320 140, 390 140"/>
  <!-- Reverse reads to QUAST (optional) -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 345 C 240 345, 300 155, 390 155"/>

  <!-- Kraken2 to Bracken -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 590 330 C 660 330, 680 340, 740 340"/>

  <!-- QUAST to ToolDistillator -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 590 110 C 660 110, 700 170, 760 170"/>
  <!-- CheckM2 to ToolDistillator -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 590 220 C 660 220, 700 200, 760 200"/>
  <!-- Kraken2 to ToolDistillator -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 590 330 C 670 330, 710 230, 760 230"/>
  <!-- Bracken to ToolDistillator -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 940 340 C 970 340, 740 260, 760 260"/>

  <!-- ToolDistillator to Summarize -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 960 200 C 1000 200, 1000 310, 1020 310"/>

  <!-- Outputs -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 590 110 C 630 110, 220 470, 260 470"/>
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 590 220 C 640 220, 430 470, 470 470"/>
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 590 330 C 650 330, 630 470, 670 470"/>
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 940 340 C 960 340, 830 470, 870 470"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->

  <!-- Contigs FASTA -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 90)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">1:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Contigs FASTA</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">FASTA</text>
    <text x="90" y="68" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Assembled bacterial</text>
    <text x="90" y="80" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">genome contigs</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Forward reads (optional) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 210)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">2:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Forward Reads</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">FASTQ (optional)</text>
    <text x="90" y="68" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">For QUAST reference-</text>
    <text x="90" y="80" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">free assessment</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Reverse reads (optional) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 320)">
    <rect width="180" height="75" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">3:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Reverse Reads</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">FASTQ (optional)</text>
    <text x="90" y="68" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Paired-end R2</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="25" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->

  <!-- QUAST -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(390, 65)">
    <rect width="200" height="110" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">4:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">QUAST</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Assembly Quality</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">N50, L50, # contigs,</text>
    <text x="100" y="78" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">total length, misassembly</text>
    <text x="100" y="98" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#10b981">HTML + tabular reports</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="75" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="90" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CheckM2 -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(390, 185)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">5:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">CheckM2</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Genome Completeness</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">ML-based completeness</text>
    <text x="100" y="78" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">and contamination check</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="35" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="35" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Kraken2 -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(390, 290)">
    <rect width="200" height="110" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">6:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Kraken2</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Taxonomy Assignment</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">k-mer based taxonomic</text>
    <text x="100" y="78" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">classification of contigs</text>
    <text x="100" y="98" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#10b981">contamination screening</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="40" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="40" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Bracken -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(740, 300)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">7:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Bracken</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Abundance Estimation</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Species-level abundance</text>
    <text x="100" y="78" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">re-estimation</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="40" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="40" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- ToolDistillator -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(760, 140)">
    <rect width="200" height="110" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">8:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">ToolDistillator</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">QC Result Integration</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Consolidates quality</text>
    <text x="100" y="78" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">and taxonomy metrics</text>
    <text x="100" y="98" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#10b981">structured JSON output</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="60" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="90" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="60" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- ToolDistillator Summarize (Green report) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(1000, 270)">
    <rect width="130" height="80" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="130" height="28" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="130" height="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">9:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Summarize</text>
    <text x="65" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Aggregate</text>
    <text x="65" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">QC summary</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="40" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->

  <!-- QUAST Report -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(210, 450)">
    <rect width="130" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="130" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="130" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="65" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">QUAST Report</text>
    <text x="65" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">HTML + tabular</text>
    <circle cx="50" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CheckM2 Report -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(410, 450)">
    <rect width="140" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="140" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="140" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="70" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">CheckM2 Report</text>
    <text x="70" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">completeness tabular</text>
    <circle cx="50" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Taxonomy Report -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(620, 450)">
    <rect width="140" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="140" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="140" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="70" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">Taxonomy Report</text>
    <text x="70" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Kraken2 tabular</text>
    <circle cx="50" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Bracken Abundance -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(820, 450)">
    <rect width="140" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="140" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="140" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="70" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">Abundance Report</text>
    <text x="70" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Bracken tabular</text>
    <circle cx="50" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Summary -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(1000, 450)">
    <rect width="120" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="120" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="120" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="60" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">Summary</text>
    <text x="60" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">JSON</text>
    <circle cx="50" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(20, 535)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#495057">Legend:</text>
    <rect x="60" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="80" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Input</text>
    <rect x="120" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="140" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Analysis</text>
    <line x1="200" y1="-4" x2="240" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="248" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="310" y1="-4" x2="350" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="358" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">QC metrics</text>
    <rect x="430" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="450" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Output</text>
    <rect x="500" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="520" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Report</text>
  </g>

</svg>
